description: Messages with thinking/reasoning output (for models that support extended thinking)

message.content: Based on my analysis, the best approach is to use a binary search algorithm.
message.thinking: The problem requires finding an element in a sorted array. Linear search would be O(n), but since it's sorted, binary search with O(log n) is more efficient...
